thread.title: Shell says scraps controversial oil exploration in Alaska
thread.title_full: Shell says scraps controversial oil exploration in Alaska

title: Shell says scraps controversial oil exploration in Alaska
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Sep 28, 2015, 07:46 BST - UK Markets open in 14 mins. Shell says scraps controversial oil exploration in Alaska AFP – 10 minutes ago View Photo 

Anglo-Dutch energy giant Royal Dutch Shell (Xetra: R6C1.DE - news ) said Monday it had scrapped its controversial offshore exploration in Alaska after failing to find sufficient quantities of oil and gas. 
Shell (LSE: RDSB.L - news ) announced that its Burger J well in the Chukchi Sea, off the northwest coast, failed to warrant more exploration, adding that it "will now cease further exploration activity in offshore Alaska for the foreseeable future".
